title: Ticket #1200: Use non-blocking gram version function in gt2 gahp
description: Globus 5.0.0 adds a jobmanager version query function to the gram client api, but only in a blocking form. Globus 5.0.1 will add a non-blocking form. Once Globus 5.0.1 is released, we should use it and switch to the non-blocking form of the version function.
remarks:

Pushed commit to V7_5_2-branch.
check_ins: 2010-Apr-13 09:40   Check-in [17851]: Use non-blocking gram version function in gt2 gahp. #1200 We never want to use blocking functions for interacting with remote systems. With Globus 5.0.0, there was no non-blocking function for GRAM_GET_JOBMANAGER_VERSION. Now with Globus 5.0.1, there is, so use it. (By Jaime Frey )
